item.title: Results of the Email Reactivation & Segmentation campaign (>11k emails sent)
item.description: Super Positive Emails The best thing I’ve gotten out of this email blast are a lot of positive emails from people I have not spoken to in a while. They’ve been motivating and great to catch up with. Some of them have ended up in lunches and meetings that have just been great. I got a lot of love! One of the most unexpected and motivating emails came from my father in law, Graziano.
